description: This file defines the AccountScreen widget in a Flutter application, responsible for displaying user profile info, saved address, and favorite restaurants. It also provides navigation to edit profile and restaurant detail screens.

classes.name: AccountScreen
classes.description: A StatelessWidget that displays user account information, saved address, and favorite restaurants. It allows navigation to edit profile and restaurant details.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the AccountScreen UI, retrieving user profile data, favorites, and constructing the widget tree including profile info, saved address, and favorites list.
